6.eng-name: The Book of the Times (of Prayer)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Ishaq said:"I heard Masruq and Al-Aswad say: We bear witness that 'Aishah said: 'When the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was with me after 'Asr, he would pray them (these two Rak'ahs)

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ بَعْدَ الْعَصْرِ
